short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Used to add AliveChat functionality from Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Extension for AliveChat allows you to log into AliveChat directly from your Chrome browser without visiting our website.
Receive desktop pop-up notifications whenever there is a new incoming chat or visitor on your web site.
Now you can increase productivity with this add-on extension on your favorite browser! 2.1 includes an update when pop-ups do not occur. 2.2.4 includes a fix for the issue with Operator auto log out after idle time.
